CRISPR-Seq Workflow Documentation
======================================

What is CRISPR-Seq?
-------------------

	An analysis pipeline for aligning sequencing reads, quantification and statistical significance of indels, and visualizing indel distributions. 

How CRISPR-Seq works
--------------------

	Algorithm description. 

Using CRISPR-Seq
----------------

   docker
